sentences.en: Fantastic and grotesque elements that have widespread distribution in myths are especially puzzling.
sentences.cn: 神话故事中层出不穷的怪诞与奇异因素尤其令人费解.
加里对她的反应感到迷惑。

sentences.en: God is indeed a puzzling figure in her work.
sentences.cn: 上帝在她的作品里的确是个使人迷惑的人物.

sentences.en: He sits puzzling over ancient Hebrew texts.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那里对着古老的希伯来文本大伤脑筋。

sentences.en: He was studying the map and puzzling about the easiest way to cross the mountains.
sentences.cn: 他在仔细察看地图,想找出最容易穿过山区的道路.

sentences.en: His letter poses a number of puzzling questions.
sentences.cn: 他的信中提出了许多令人困惑的问题。

sentences.en: His very last paintings are perhaps the most puzzling.
sentences.cn: 他去世前的最后一批画作也许是最让人困惑的。

sentences.en: I have been puzzling about this question for weeks now.
sentences.cn: 我对这个问题已冥思苦想了好几个星期.

sentences.en: I must admit, it's puzzling in the extreme just how these books found their way here.
sentences.cn: 我不得不说,这些书怎么会出现在这儿, 真是 太 奇怪了.
就连现在,我对这仍然有点迷迷糊糊呢.

sentences.en: If you pin people down, they will tell you some puzzling things about stress.
sentences.cn: 如果非让他们说的话，人们会告诉你一些有关压力的令人费解的事情。

sentences.en: Some experimentalists may suddenly see an underlying order in nature's most puzzling process.
sentences.cn: 某些实验主义者不定何时突然识破了这自然界最令人困惑的过程的基本规律.

sentences.en: The spelling of English is often puzzling.
sentences.cn: 英语的拼写常常使人伤脑筋.

sentences.en: This is one of the most puzzling cases I have ever run up against.
sentences.cn: 这是我经手的最难办的案件之一.

sentences.en: This whole business is very puzzling.
sentences.cn: 这件事从头到尾都很让人费解。

sentences.en: This whole business is very puzzling. There is a lot more to it than meets the eye.
sentences.cn: 整件事非常令人费解，远比看起来复杂。
